page.title: 10Education
page.content: Solihull has 83 primary schools and 18 secondary schools. It also has a sixth form college and technical college. There are 5 special schools for handicapped children and a boarding school for the physically handicapped. In our block there are 7 primary, 3 church primary and 3 secondary schools plus the technical college. There are also 4 private schools. They are Ruckleigh and Eversfield Preparatory Schools, St.Martins girls school and Solihull School. Solihull School was formerly Solihull Grammar School and has enjoyed a good reputation for over 400 years. It is a fee paying school and the passing of an entrance exam is required. There are some scholarships available each year.
